subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mr. Moore, who drove in 49 races in Nascar’s Grand National series, now known as the Sprint Cup, was recognized by Nascar as its oldest living driver.
snippet: Mr. Moore, who drove in 49 races in Nascar’s Grand National series, now known as the Sprint Cup, was recognized by Nascar as its oldest living driver.
